The company was founded in 2008 and has since grown to become a leading provider of risk management software, with clients including some of the world's largest banks and asset managers. Coalition's technology platform allows financial institutions to monitor and manage their risk exposure in real-time, providing insights into market trends and potential risks. The company has received numerous awards for its innovative approach to risk management, including the Risk Management Technology Provider of the Year at the Risk Awards in 2019.
